name: Dragon Ball Super: Eternal Rivals [Mid Term v2]
name_original: Dragon Ball Super: Eternal Rivals [Mid Term v2]
description:
Dragon Ball Super: Eternal Rivals [Mid Term v2] is an action game developed by RoqSolid. It was originally released in 2016.
Dragon Ball Super: Eternal Rivals [Mid Term v2] is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
